meanings.sent1: The ancient tablet had intricate glyphic symbols etched into its surface.
meanings.sent2: The archaeologist studied the glyphic writing on the stone monument.
meanings.sent3: The children created a secret code using colorful glyphic drawings.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a labyrinth of glyphic thoughts, each one a puzzle to solve.
meanings.sent5: The artist used vibrant colors to bring the glyphic patterns to life on the canvas.

meanings.definition: Carved or engraved in a glyphic manner.
meanings.sent1: The intricate design on the ancient artifact was clearly glyphic in nature.
meanings.sent2: The glyphic patterns on the wall told a story of ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel left a glyphic trail of acorn carvings in the tree bark.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like glyphic engravings on his heart, leaving a lasting impression.
meanings.sent5: The moonlight cast a glyphic shadow of the tree branches on the forest floor.
